mapper.select: select level AS code, count(*) as count from event GROUP BY level ORDER BY level ;
select type_id AS code, count(*) as count from event GROUP BY type_id ORDER BY type_id;
select app_code AS code, count(*) as count from event GROUP BY app_code ORDER BY app_code ;

SELECT e.*, a.name as app_name, t.name as type_name FROM test.event as e left join test.event_app_code as a on e.app_code = a.code left join test.event_type as t on e.type_id = t.id
${ew.sqlSegment}

SELECT e.*, a.name as app_name, t.name as type_name FROM test.event as e left join test.event_app_code as a on e.app_code = a.code left join test.event_type as t on e.type_id = t.id
${ew.sqlSegment}
